Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: 'A few notes on the records of the machine consciousness experiment:', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "To help some machines from the controlled experiment experience the same path of human growth, every mechanoid's frame is replaced regularly.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'This is to simulate "growing up" as humans do.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'While replacing their frame, MPA-01 will inspect their memory drives and neural logic circuits, recording accordingly.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_04.jpg'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'Nice to meet you.'}
{3: 'The only light in the room shines from above, illuminating the girl sitting in the center.'}
{3: 'She looks no more than five to six years old, showing no fear despite being alone in a cold, dark room. Instead, she observes everything around her curiously.'}
{3: 'Her neck is connected to a few cables, but she does not seem to notice.'}
{3: 'She finds no human but a giant terminal before her. As the terminal speaks in a soft female voice, the girl reacts with awe before approaching the small camera.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Are you the one talking?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'What is this place? Nanami only remembers Mom telling a story... before I fell asleep.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Is Nanami dreaming?'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'You can certainly interpret this as a dream. You will wake up in your bed when the sun rises.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Whoa... This is the first time I've had such a clear dream! Who are you?"}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'I am Heuristic Artificial Intelligence Caretaking Machine-Alpha, identification code: MPA-01.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: 'Records of the machine consciousness experiment:', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Behavior account of subject MPL-00.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Log 23. Personality data normal.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'From our conversation, I have discovered that the subject possesses a far more developed sensibility and expression ability regarding her emotions.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Additionally, in order to avoid the subject becoming suspicious of her identity as a "human"—', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I will be removing her relevant memories according to the regulation as authorized.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Conservation complete. Executing memory data removal.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Removal complete.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_04.jpg'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'Nice to meet you.'}
{3: 'Same time. Same room. Same machine.'}
{3: 'The small, grey-haired girl sits on the floor and looks up, watching the giant machine terminal.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Who are you?'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'I am Heuristic Artificial Intelligence Caretaking Machine-Alpha, identification code: MPA-01.'}
{3: 'Same introduction.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Machine... You're not human?"}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'I am comprised of data and programs. I cannot be categorized as human.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I see...'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "My parents always say that machines are humans' friends."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "So, you're also..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Eh, what did you say your name was?'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'Heuristic Artificial Intelligence Caretaking Machine-Alpha.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Heuristic Artificial Intel... Ouch!'}
{3: 'She bites her tongue trying to say the long and tongue-twisting title.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Your name is so long... Does everyone call you that?'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: "My user only calls me by my identification code. Therefore, unlike humans, I wasn't given a name."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...How about Nanami calls you "Haicma" from now on?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Haicma!'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'That... is a wonderful name.'}
{2: 'MPA-01', 3: 'Thank you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_17.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Do you want to know what "happy" things I saw today, Haicma?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Well... I visited the aquarium with my parents!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami saw a very large bionic whale and a very large bear.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'The splashes the dolphins made when they jumped got—this—high!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Have you been to an aquarium, Haicma?'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I am an administrative AI without a body capable of mobility. I have not visited the place you mentioned.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hm... What if Nanami puts a camera on her that's connected to you? Then I can take you everywhere I go!"}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'As a matter of fact, I can visit any place through virtual reality. I am able to see the things you described.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "That's not the same..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's different when you see the real thing with your own eyes. Not to mention that Nanami wants to visit it with you, Haicma!"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm sure we'll have a wonderful time if we go together!"}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I never thought of this possibility, but...'}
{3: 'The gentle voice pauses for a second before speaking with a smile in its tone.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Yes... I'm sure we'll have a wonderful time."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Wait! Nanami can also draw the things she saw and show you!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'll bring them with me and show you if there's a next time."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '...Is there a next time?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: 'Records of the machine consciousness experiment:', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Behavior account of subject MPL-00.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Log 36. Personality data normal.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'It is worth mentioning that the subject has shown an eagerness toward creative expression. This is a very unusual behavior for a mechanoid.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'To further analyze this situation in-depth, I have requested creative tools from my user for our next session.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Conservation complete. Executing memory data removal.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'On a side note, regarding the name "Haicma" subject Nanami has given me—', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Based on my calculation, keeping the name only has a 0.08% chance of influencing the subject's memory data.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Therefore, I've chosen to keep the name.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I\'ll be using the name "Haicma" in my next session with Nanami.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_17.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmm... Who are you?'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Hello. I'm Heuristic Artificial Intelligence Caretaking Machine-Alpha. You can call me... Haicma."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Haicma... That rings a bell. Has Nanami seen you before?'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: '...No. This is our first time seeing each other.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Do you also want to know what Nanami likes, Haicma?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Can you believe that my teacher also asked me the same thing today?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami's previous teacher only let us draw apples and eggs, but the new teacher told us we could draw whatever we wanted."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'So... Nanami drew a lot of things on the paper!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "A giant mech that's taller than a mountain... Cardman Rider... the gifts my parents gave me... and Mimi's fur ball... Ah! Wait—"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami suddenly remembers that there's one more thing she wants to draw!"}
{3: 'The girl picks up the pen and paper next to her and starts drawing.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hm... Let's add a flower here..."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2701_05.jpg'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Done!'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ta-da! I drew Nanami and her friend!'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'You can be friends... even with machines?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Yep, this might be the first time we see each other, but you're Nanami's friend now!"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "We'll meet again, right? Haicma."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Of course, I look forward to our next meeting.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: 'Records of the machine consciousness experiment:', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Behavior account of subject MPL-00.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'At the beginning of the experiment, I conducted drawing-related tests on twelve humanoid mechanoids.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "They were free to draw whatever they wanted. I wanted to see what topics they'd choose.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Originally, their drawings were all amalgamations of pictures from their image database.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "At some point, Nanami's drawings began to show obvious changes. She started to draw according to her personal preferences.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'She even tried to express her feelings with her drawings.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Eventually, her drawings became indecipherable to humans. My neural logic circuit has shown apparent deviations after analyzing these pictures.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 8: '1'}
{1: "I can't determine the cause yet, but I'll log this occurrence in my report.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'On a side note, the next time Nanami replaces her frame will be her 18-year-old birthday.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's a human custom for family and friends to give the birthday celebrant presents and blessings.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Based on that custom, I should also prepare a "present" for Nanami. I\'m registering it as mission 376.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '...I\'m detecting "expectation" from my emotion simulator, but that module is currently off.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Performing self-test.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '...System normal.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory584.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The door to the laboratory finally opens, and the exhausted-looking female researcher walks in, her eyes red as if she has just been through an intense argument.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Cancel the frame replacement with Nanami next week, MPA-01.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Understood. It's been removed from the schedule."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Is it because of the machine virus outbreak that happened recently?'}
{3: 'The researcher nods, leaning on the desk frailly.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Based on the rate the virus is spreading, I estimate that it'll hit the closest city to this lab in three days."}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'The Science Council has terminated the machine consciousness experiment. All the machines would probably have to...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She covers her face with her hands, quietly sobbing.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'I understand why they ordered it, but I...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her tears take over before she can finish her words. After a long time, she finally looks up, her expression no longer sorrowful. She seems determined, as she always has.'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'I have to prepare a few things now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "I'm sorry... All I can do now...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She enters a command in the terminal, and the computers in the room begin to shut down row by row. She steps outside of the room, locking the door.'}
{3: 'Darkness approaches, and the administrative AI loses all senses.'}
